title: Nintendo Switch Presentation 2017 Liveblog
text:
Nintendo Switch Presentation 2017 Liveblog We finally learn the release date, price, and games for Nintendo's Switch. Last updated by Scott Butterworth on January 12, 2017 at 2:09PM Want the latest gaming news as it breaks? All the highlights in the world of games, lovingly delivered 2-3 times/week. You're Good to Go! You are now subscribed Subscribe for the latest gaming news 
You can watch today's Nintendo Switch Presentation live from Japan right here , but if video isn't an option (or you just want to read along with all of the exciting announcements), check out our liveblog below! 
We expect to get confirmation on a lot of Nintendo Switch details, but the most exciting are the surprises. What secrets and new games does Nintendo have in store? Find out tonight at 8PM PST (11PM EST). Filed under:
